class.name: point_cloud_transport/organized_pub
class.description: This plugin publishes a CompressedPointCloud2 topic by projecting the 3d points onto an 2D grid and compressing the grid like its a png image.

class.name: point_cloud_transport/organized_sub
class.description: This plugin decompresses a CompressedPointCloud2 topic by decompressing like its a png image and deprojecting the image into 3d.
